r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n: ## Application Security Management (0.8.1) ### Fixed - Remove max payload size on remote config calls DataDog/dd-appsec-php#256 - Improve output of phpinfo DataDog/dd-appsec-php#259 - Avoid emitting errors when blocking on RSHUTDOWN DataDog/dd-appsec-php#261 - Improve RSHUTDOWN blocking and add logging DataDog/dd-appsec-php#264
